lyrics:
Brittany (WMHS Girls):
Girls, we run this mother, yeah

Some of them men think they freak this

Make your check, come at they neck
Disrespect us, no they won't

Boy, don't even try to touch this
Boy, this beat is crazy

Houston, Texas, baby

This goes out to all my girls
That's in the club rocking the latest
Who will buy it for themselves

I think I need a barber
None of these people can fade me
I'm so good with this
I remind you I'm so hood with this

Boy, I'm just playing, come here,baby
Hope you still like me, if you pay me

Santana:
You'll do anything for me

Who run the world? Girls (Girls)

What time it is, check

Better cut my check

This goes out to all the women getting it in

Boy I know you love it how we're

See, you'd better not play me, don't come here, baby

The world (Who run this mother?)
